snippet: Cumbersome process makes it hard for India's 10 million overseas citizens to vote.
abstract: Cumbersome process makes it hard for India's 10 million overseas citizens to vote.
lead_paragraph: On Sunday, Indian Prime Minister Manmohan Singh reminded his country's 10 million non-resident citizens that they can vote in elections under a law passed in 2010.

headline.main: Why NRIs Are Also NVIs (Non Voting Indians)
